entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 07:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -15.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
